Diagnosis
	1. Mucinous cystic neoplasm of pancreas, T1N0M0

	Date of diagnosis
	March 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Mar 2024 Distal pancreatectomy and splenectomy

	Radiotherapy
	Not indicated

	Chemotherapy
	Not indicated

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	No evidence of disease

	Current issues
	Post-operative recovery

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed [redacted name] today at 6 weeks post-surgery. Recovery progressing well with improving energy levels and appetite. Surgical wound has healed well. No concerning symptoms. Blood glucose remains stable. Weight stable at 72kg.

	Further investigations
	Surveillance MRI pancreas booked for 3 months

	Medication prescribed
	Pneumococcal vaccination arranged

	Follow up
	Next surgical follow up with Mr [redacted name] in 3 months
Next oncology follow up in 6 months with surveillance imaging

	Required GP actions
	Please monitor post-splenectomy vaccination schedule

cancer_timeline.value: Post-operative recovery progressing well with improving energy levels and appetite

status_updates.value: Early stage pancreatic mucinous cystic neoplasm treated with curative surgery. Recovering well post-operatively with no evidence of disease.
Surgical follow up in 3 months, oncology follow up in 6 months with surveillance imaging
